mpl_extensions.name: mpl-interactions
mpl_extensions.desc: Sliders to control matplotlib and other interactive goodies. Works in any interactive backend and even uses ipywidgets in Jupyter.

mpl_extensions.name: mpl-point-clicker
mpl_extensions.desc: A multiclass point clicker for matplotlib.

mpl_extensions.name: mpl-image-labeller
mpl_extensions.desc: Matplotlib image labeller for classifying images.

mpl_extensions.name: mpl-playback
mpl_extensions.desc: Record and playback user interactions with matplotlib figures.

mpl_extensions.name: mpl-pan-zoom
mpl_extensions.desc: Zooming and panning for matplotlib plots.

mpl_extensions.name: mpl-draggable-line
mpl_extensions.desc: A draggable line widget for matplotlib.

other.name: jupyterlab-vimrc
other.desc: Add a basic vimrc to JupyterLab vim.

other.name: microutil
other.desc: A library for analyzing microscopy datasets.
